data.title: J.J.Thomson the first time identified an electron as a particle and his son G.P.Thomson first time identified an electron as a wave and both were awarded Nobel prizes in different years. TrueFalse
data.meta_description: Click here:point_up_2:to get an answer to your question :writing_hand:jjthomson for the first time identified electron as a particle and his son gpthomson first
data.text:
Solution

Verified by Toppr

George Paget Thomson (G.P.Thomson) awarded Nobel Prize in 1937 "for their experimental discovery of the diffraction of electrons by crystals and first time identified electron as a wave" and his father Joseph John Thomson was awarded Nobel Prize in 1906 "for the first time identified electron as a particle".

Therefore, the given statement is true.
